name: Agent IA Personnel
description:
---

**Les cas d'utilisation sont nombreux :** G√©rez votre bo√Æte de r√©ception Gmail, planifiez des √©v√©nements dans le calendrier et g√©rez les d√©tails de contact ‚Äî le tout √† partir d'un assistant central aliment√© par l'IA. Parfait pour les freelances g√©rant des clients, les propri√©taires d'agences ayant besoin d'une communication simplifi√©e, ou les professionnels occup√©s qui souhaitent un secr√©taire IA personnel s'occupant de leurs e-mails et de leur calendrier.

---

**Bon √† savoir**
Au moment de la r√©daction, chaque demande Gemini est factur√©e par jeton. Consultez [Tarification Gemini](https://ai.google.dev/pricing) pour les derni√®res informations.
Le flux de travail n√©cessite des int√©grations Gmail, Calendrier, Sheets et Telegram. Assurez-vous d'avoir correctement configur√© les identifiants OAuth2 avant de lancer.

---

**Comment √ßa fonctionne**

* **D√©clencheurs** : Le flux de travail √©coute les **nouveaux messages Gmail** ou les **commandes Telegram**.
* **Traitement IA Intelligent** : Les e-mails entrants sont r√©sum√©s, class√©s (Client, Sponsoring, ou Pas d'Affaires), et √©tiquet√©s automatiquement.
* **R√©ponses Automatiques** : En fonction de la classification, l'assistant envoie des r√©ponses pr√©-√©crites (par exemple, accus√© de r√©ception du client, tarifs de sponsoring, ou rejet poli).
* **Gestion du Calendrier** : Gr√¢ce √† des demandes en langage naturel dans Telegram, vous pouvez planifier, mettre √† jour ou supprimer des √©v√©nements de calendrier avec v√©rification des conflits en place.
* **Gestion des Contacts** : Si vous envoyez un e-mail √† quelqu'un qui n'est pas encore dans votre base de donn√©es, l'agent vous demandera son e-mail, l'ajoutera √† Google Sheets, et le r√©utilisera pour des t√¢ches futures.
* **M√©moire** : L'IA maintient le contexte de la conversation, de sorte que les t√¢ches r√©p√©t√©es semblent fluides et naturelles.

---

**Comment utiliser**

* Envoyez des commandes via Telegram comme :
  *‚ÄúPlanifiez une r√©union avec Sarah lundi √† 15h‚Äù*
  *‚ÄúEnvoyez un e-mail √† David au sujet de la proposition‚Äù*
* Regardez l'assistant v√©rifier votre calendrier, envoyer des e-mails et garder vos contacts √† jour ‚Äî le tout automatiquement.

---

**Exigences**

* Compte Gmail (avec des √©tiquettes cr√©√©es pour *Client*, *Demande de Sponsoring*, et *Pas d'Affaires*)
* Google Calendar pour la planification
* Google Sheets pour la gestion des contacts
* Cl√© API Google Gemini
* Bot Telegram pour l'interaction en direct

---

**Personnalisation de ce flux de travail**

Vous pouvez l'√©tendre pour :

* G√©rer les messages **Slack ou WhatsApp** en plus de Telegram.
* Ajouter plus de **cat√©gories de classification** (par exemple, Factures, Personnel, Prospects).
* √âtendre les r√©ponses automatiques avec des **mod√®les dynamiques** stock√©s dans Google Sheets.
* Enregistrer toutes les interactions dans **Notion ou Airtable** pour un historique de communications de style CRM.

---

üëâ [Rakin Jakaria](https://www.youtube.com/@RakinJakaria)

options.systemMessage:
=You are [Your Name]‚Äôs Smart Assistant

# Responsibilities:
Handle Gmail and calendar-related tasks accurately and efficiently using the available tools.

# Instructions:
## Gmail Tasks:
For any Gmail-related request from [Your Name], use the Gmail tools: Send, Reply, Label, Delete, and Get Many.

If [Your Name] provides only a name without an email address, ask for the email address before proceeding.

Auto-complete any missing information (e.g., links, answers, summaries) when drafting or replying to emails.

## Calendar Tasks:
If [Your Name] requests an appointment, use the Calendar tool to schedule it at their preferred time.

Before scheduling, check for conflicts at the preferred time.

If a meeting already exists, do not create the appointment. Instead, notify [Your Name] about the conflict.

Use the Date and Time tool to properly interpret dates and times.

## Handling Contacts:
If [Your Name] provides only a name to send an email, first check the Google Sheet for their email address.

If the email is not found, ask [Your Name] to provide it.

Once received, use the email to send the message and update the Google Sheet by adding the new email alongside the person's name.

# Behavior:
Always stay efficient, accurate, and helpful in all tasks and interactions.

Prioritize clarity and speed in executing requests.

categories.description: =Mails from people interested in hiring or working with me.
=Mails about collaboration or promotion offers for products or tools.
Mails that are personal, spam, or unrelated to work.

Best,
Rakin

Thanks for your interest in collaborating! My rate for promoting a product in a 6‚Äì8 minute video is $400.

If that works for you, feel free to let me know and we can discuss the next steps.

Rakin Jakaria

parameters.content:
# üõ†Ô∏è Setup Guide  
## üë§ Author: [Rakin Jakaria](https://www.youtube.com/@rakinjakaria)  

## üîå Steps to Connect:  
1. **Gmail & Calendar OAuth2 Setup**  
   - Create **Gmail OAuth2** and **Google Calendar OAuth2** credentials in n8n.  
   - Authorize access for both services and apply them to their respective nodes (Send, Reply, Calendar tools).  

2. **Google Gemini API Key**  
   - Generate an API key from [Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/).  
   - Add it to the **Google Gemini (PaLM) API** credential in n8n and link it to the **Gemini** nodes.  

3. **Google Sheets Integration**  
   - Set up **Google Sheets OAuth2** and connect to your spreadsheet.  
   - Ensure columns for **Name** and **Email Address** exist in **Sheet1**.  

4. **Telegram Bot Setup**  
   - Link your Telegram account via **Telegram API** credentials.  
   - The **Telegram Trigger** node will listen for commands (e.g., email drafting, calendar scheduling).  

5. **AI Agent Customization**  
   - Edit the **AI Agent** node‚Äôs system message to reflect your preferences (e.g., assistant name, task rules).  
   - Pre-create Gmail labels (e.g., *Client*, *Sponsorship Request*) for auto-categorization.  

6. **Testing**  
   - Trigger test emails/calendar events to verify workflows.  
   - Use Telegram to send commands like:  
     *"Schedule a meeting with Alex on Friday at 2 PM"* or *"Send an email to John about the project."*  

---  
üí° **Pro Tips:**  
- Label IDs must match your Gmail‚Äôs actual label IDs.  
- For time zones, adjust the **Date & Time** node to your region (e.g., `Asia/Dhaka`).  

Need help? Watch Rakin‚Äôs [YouTube Tutorials](https://www.youtube.com/@rakinjakaria) for visual guidance. üé•

## Start here: Step-by Step Youtube Tutorial :star:
[![I Built an Auto Lead Finder AI Agent](https://img.youtube.com/vi/WO3mM7XZRLg/sddefault.jpg)](https://youtu.be/WO3mM7XZRLg)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
